means: （宗）阿们宗派（十七世纪成立的孟诺教派，因创此教派的雅可布阿们而得名）

sentence.Network_en: Rarely do the Amish marry outside their sect.
sentence.Network_cn: amish人很少和他们宗派以外的人通婚.

sentence.Network_en: Another important Amish belief is that people should not above themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾米许人另一项重要信仰是:人不应该[自我膨胀].

sentence.Network_en: These are the Amish, an enduring and endearing people.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些就是亚米希人, 一个屹立不摇又令人喜爱的民族.
